CustomField.formula: 'Q'+TEXT(CEILING( MONTH (DATEVALUE( Case__r.CreatedDate ) ) / 3 )) + RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Case__r.CreatedDate ))), 2) + IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "1 - IV"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death not foreseeable") ,ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death foreseeable")) ) ,"S1",IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "2 - Oral"),ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "3 - Oral and IV")),OR( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death not foreseeable") ,ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death foreseeable"))),"S2",IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Transfer of Request"),"S3",IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Withdrawn Request"),"S4",IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Ineligible"),"S5",IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Death Prior"),"S6","")))))) + '-' + Case__r.PHN__c
CustomField.label: Record_ID1
